TopicTitle: APOLLO (SATURN-V with F1 & J2, APOLLO CSM, LEM, LLRV). by OLDD (v.1.4. 09.05.14)

Articles.Content:
Will you make an SLA with jettisonable panels? The version with hinged panels was used on Saturn IB flights, but was deemed too risky to use by the time of Saturn V. Because of that, Saturn V version of S-IVB used jettisonable panels.

well, i have tried. but cant understand how to orient panel's axis in unity. (i mean for ModuleJettison). When i tried to jettison it - it flown to any direction, but not at one i want. need a manual.

well, i have tried. but cant understand how to orient panel's axis in unity. (i mean for ModuleJettison). When i tried to jettison it - it flown to any direction, but not at one i want. need a manual.

Frizzank somehow solved it for his S-V perfectly. Try to look around it or ask him, maybe that could help.

Forgive me for asking this, but I've been away from the forum for a while.

Whatever happened to the ASTP and Skylab parts? Are you still planning to do those?
Oh,man,the Apollo CM IVA is amazing...please give it us this IVA,released if is ready!!!

Forgive me for asking this, but I've been away from the forum for a while.

Whatever happened to the ASTP and Skylab parts? Are you still planning to do those?

I agree what about the IVA for CM? Denny I totally understand why you might not want to come back, but there ALOT of people who are looking for high fidelity historical replicas. Look all over the forums, a large amount of people reference you as the standard of quality, when it comes to replicas and modeling.
Ummmmm do you have any idea how long people have been waiting for this? Through FASA and OLDD?
think DENNY will soon release updated! one can only wait
well, typically motivation is simple, if my pictures gathering some rep, i'll going to finish (public relise) the project, otherwise - will do stuff for home use...

well, typically motivation is simple, if my pictures gathering some rep, i'll going to finish (public relise) the project, otherwise - will do stuff for home use...

Oh god please finish them including the whole dynasoar package. Your work is amazing.

Gave you some rep. Everyone's really looking forward to Saturn V, you know? Also, I've got something that could interest you. I've recently finished an FX set (using the Smokescreen plugin) that would allow you to get rid of stock KSP engine plumes and give it realistic ones. They're even based on real engine thermodynamics. I've made them for Realism Overhaul, but scaling them down to fit your Saturn V won't be a problem. PM me if you're interested.

Your work is amazing Denny. Your work is my inspiration to make my own mod! You have alot of good model that isn't release [Zond,LOK,LK,Skylab,Dynasoar,Atlas,ASTP Docking adapter,Titan IIIC] I believe that lot of us still waiting for your work!
Would love to see the N1 lander finished and its great to see you Denny please release what you have we would love to have those in our collection

Give him the rep people!!!

I'm getting initialization error with the LEM. It must be something related to FASA, but I completely deleted everything related to the CSM and the lander. I checked if I had 2 ModuleManager.dll and it only had one. I love this mod, but this error probably disable some features from the LEM, any help would be appreciated.

Let me see if I got it. The mod uses RPM 0.14 and the most recent one is 0.18, which the mod was made with the old version and It doesn't support the most recent one. Is that correct?

Let me see if I got it. The mod uses RPM 0.14 and the most recent one is 0.18, which the mod was made with the old version and It doesn't support the most recent one. Is that correct?

Correct the newest version of RPM is incompatible with this MOD. Denny needs to update some stuff and it should work just fine with .25. So you need to do two things, give Denny rep so he updates this Saturn V and two go to the RPM github and dowload the 0.14 version of RPM if you want to get everything to work the way you want it to.

Here is a patch for the RPM's just copy it over in to your KSP/GameData and override if, I break anything my bad.https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/OLDD.zip

EDIT- There where some sounds files that point to the wrong place but not sure how they work he doesn't have that mod listed but anyway THANKS DENNY FOR ALL THE WORK YOU DO.
